stats.name: Spider Swarm Venom
stats.text: (poison) **Saving Throw** DC 14 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 4 rounds; **Stage 1** 1 poison damage and enfeebled 1 (1 round); **Stage 2** 1d4 poison damage and enfeebled 1 (1 round)

stats.name: Spring Upon Prey
stats.text: **Requirements** Initiative not  rolled; **Trigger** A creature touches the hunting spider's web while the spider is on it; **Effect** The hunting spider automatically notices the creature and Strides, Climbs, or Descends on a Web before it rolls initiative.

stats.name: Descend on a Web
stats.text: The hunting spider moves straight down a web line up to 40 feet. Striking the web (AC 20, Hardness 3, 5 HP) severs it, causing the spider to fall.

stats.name: Hunting Spider Venom
stats.text: (poison) **Saving Throw** DC 16 Fortitude; Maximum Duration 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d4 poison damage and off-guard (1 round); **Stage 2** 1d6 poison damage, clumsy 1, and off-guard (1 round); **Stage 3** 1d6 poison damage, clumsy 2, and off-guard (1 round)

stats.name: Web Trap
stats.text: A creature hit by the hunting spider's web Strike is immobilized and stuck to the nearest surface until it Escapes (DC 17).

stats.name: Spring Upon Prey
stats.text: **Requirements** Initiative not  rolled; **Trigger** A creature touches the hunting spider's web while the spider is on it; **Effect** The hunting spider automatically notices the creature and Strides, Climbs, or Descends on a Web before it rolls initiative.

stats.name: Descend on a Web
stats.text: The hunting spider moves straight down a web line up to 40 feet. Striking the web (AC 20, Hardness 3, 5 HP) severs it, causing the spider to fall.

stats.name: Hunting Spider Venom
stats.text: (poison) **Saving Throw** DC 16 Fortitude; Maximum Duration 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d4 poison damage and off-guard (1 round); **Stage 2** 1d6 poison damage, clumsy 1, and off-guard (1 round); **Stage 3** 1d6 poison damage, clumsy 2, and off-guard (1 round)

stats.name: Skills
stats.text: Acrobatics +5, Athletics +2 (+4 to climb or swim), Stealth +5

stats.name: Melee
stats.text: jaws +7 (agile, finesse) **Damage** 1d6+1 piercing plus putrid plague

stats.name: Putrid Plague
stats.text: (disease) The sickened and unconscious conditions can't end or be reduced until the disease is cured. **Saving Throw** DC 14 Fortitude; **Stage 1** carrier with no ill effect (1d4 hours), **Stage 2** sickened (1 day), **Stage 3** sickened 1 and slowed 1 (1 day), **Stage 4** unconscious (1 day), **Stage 5** dead

stats.name: Hunt Prey
stats.text: [single] You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks when you Seek your prey and a +2 circumstance bonus to Survival checks when you Track your prey.

stats.name: Hunter's Edge
stats.text: +1d8 precision damage on 1st hit on prey each round

stats.name: Call Reinforcement
stats.text: [single] You whistle and summon a giant rat from one of the hiding spots (up to available reinforcement limit).

stats.name: Change Companion
stats.text: [single] You whistle and call one of the giant rat allies to attention, immediately becoming your animal companion.

stats.name: Fast Swallow
stats.text: **Trigger** The cave worm Grabs a creature; **Effect** regurgitate and deals 1d6+5 B to the creature. Deal 20ft fall damage to creatures hit (DC 15, failing takes 1/2 fall damage).

stats.name: Thrash
stats.text: Makes one strike against each creature within its reach. Limit jaws (once), body (unlimited). Apply all multi-attack penalties after action.

stats.name: Construct Trap
stats.text: [turn] (manipulate) Create a rudimentary trap on any adjacent square, on floor, wall, or ceiling. Activates when a creature next move adjacent to it. 1d6P, 1 persistent bleed, reflex 16. Deactivates in 1 use or 1 hour.

stats.name: Scamper
stats.text: [single] **Requirements** adjacent to 1 enemy **Effect** Stride with +5 feet to speed, +2 circumstance bonus to AC to reactions from this movement. Move must not end next to enemy.

stats.text: Acrobatics +06, Deception +8, Diplomacy +8, Intimidation +8, Nature +5, Stealth +6

stats.name: Inspiring Display
stats.text: [action] (auditory, emotion, linguistic, mental) **Requirement** Previous action was Cast a Spell **Effect** inspire another kobold within 30ft. That kobold gains 4 temp HP until the start of the mage's next turn

stats.name: Final Devotion
stats.text: [reaction] **Trigger** HP reduced to 0 or below but not dying from massive damage **Effects** Crazed bloodrage induce the devotee to fight for 1 extra round before collapsing, dealing an extra weapon die of Strike damage. An additional hit kills the devotee instantly.

stats.name: Construct Armor
